ConfigurationOption.Value: select c.personid, p.displayname, c.isprimary, c.iscustodian, c.isuser, c.assetnum, a.location, c.siteid, c.orgid, c.assetlocusercustid, a.assetuid from assetlocusercust c left join person p on c.personid = p.personid left join asset a on c.assetnum = a.assetnum and c.siteid = a.siteid

EventAction.Condition: := ${Is Primary} is null and ${Is Custodian} is null and ${Is User} is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: The person must be set as the Primary, Custodian, or User

List.ListEntry: a.location in ( select location from locancestor where ancestor = '${MX_WORK_LOCATION}' and siteid = '${MX_CURRENT_SITE}' ) and a.status in ('ACTIVE', 'OPERATING')
